data.introduction#Introduction: Welcome to the codeberry Docs!Let's dive into the foundational building blocks of codeberry in less than 5 minutes.
data.what-is-codeberry#What is codeberry?: codeberry is a powerful, open-source code generation tool designed to streamline and accelerate the software development process. It's customizable, opinionated, and designed to fit seamlessly into your previous workflow.
data.why-did-we-develop-codeberry#Why did we: In a world where speed is everything, everybody deserves to have a teammate to help them deliver software faster. By automating repetitive tasks and providing a structured approach to code creation, codeberry empowers developers to focus on high-value activities and solving complex problems. codeberry represents a new way of building software: moving towards a more automated, consistent, and efficient coding process while still maintaining the flexibility and creativity that characterize great software engineering.
data.core-components#Core Components: codeberry's user interface contains 6 core components: Workspaces, Projects, Issues, Templates, Instructions, and Settings which you can learn more about in the following section.
data.core-components-1#Core Components::
Workspaces
Projects
Issues
Templates
Instructions
Settings
